#summary Syx installation instructions
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Available platforms =

Syx has been tested on the following platforms:
  * Linux From Scratch 64 bit
  * Windows XP 32 bit

= System requirments =

  * The [http://www.scons.org Scons] build system
  * [http://www.gtk.org GTK+] toolkit (_optional plugin_)
  * [http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/readline/ Readline] for the console (_optional plugin, not required on Windows_)

= Getting Syx =

There currently no Syx releases, but you can find the current source in the [http://code.google.com/p/syx/source Subversion repository]:

{{{
svn checkout http://syx.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ syx
}}}

= Compiling Syx =

After you got the sources, type the following command in the syx directory 

{{{
scons debug=no
}}}

*If you get any error or warning, please refer everything to me*

= Testing it =

After the build process is done, you can run tests to check if syx works correctly on your system:

{{{
scons debug=no test
}}}

*If get errors from any of the test, contact me*
